players.name: Bob
memory: Charlie: "I don't believe Diana is the mafioso. I think Alice was killed by a different player."
Diana: "I am the mafioso and I killed Alice. The detective will find me out eventually."
You: "Let's all be cautious and not accuse anyone yet. We don't know who the mafioso is."
